name: AnalyticsCloudComponentLayoutItem

fields.name: assetType
fields.description: Specifies the type of Wave Analytics asset.

fields.name: devName
fields.description: Unique development name of the dashboard to add.

fields.name: error
fields.description: An error string that is populated only when an error occurred in the underlying dashboard.

fields.name: filter
fields.description: Dashboard filters for mapping data fields in the dashboard to the object’s fields.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Specifies the height of the dashboard, in pixels.

fields.name: hideOnError
fields.description: Controls whether users see a dashboard that has an error.

fields.name: showHeader
fields.description: If true, includes the dashboard’s header bar. If false, the dashboard appears without a header bar.

fields.name: showSharing
fields.description: If set to true, and the dashboard is shareable the dashboard shows the Share icon. If set to false, the dashboard doesn’t show the Share icon.

fields.name: showTitle
fields.description: If true, includes the dashboard’s title above the dashboard. If false, the dashboard appears without a title.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Specifies the width of the dashboard, in pixels or percentage.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.AnalyticsCloudComponentLayoutItem.

description: Represents the settings for a Wave Analytics dashboard on a standard
